message.name: ERR_TASK_BRINGFWD_CLOSED
message.locale: This task has already been closed and therefore cannot be brought forward.

message.name: ERR_TASK_BRINGFWD_NOT_IN_MYTASKS
message.locale: This task is not in your My Tasks list and therefore cannot be brought forward.

message.name: ERR_TASK_BRINGFWD_NOT_RESERVED
message.locale: This task is not reserved and therefore cannot be brought forward.

message.name: ERR_TASK_BRINGFWD_NOT_FUTURE_DATE
message.locale: Bring Forward Date and Time must be in the future.

message.name: ERR_TASK_BRINGFWD_NOT_IN_ALLOC_WORKQ
message.locale: Bring Forward tasks must be assigned to an allocation work queue.

message.name: ERR_TASK_BRINGFWD_NO_SKILLTYPE
message.locale: Bring Forward tasks must have a Skill Type.
